nodes.bodyText: Considering our little thought experiment regarding a different way to deal with sequence flow processing, I would like to use onActivated here. That would then be the state in which the flow is actually taken (while activating is the step in which the condition could be checked.
I chose activating because it is the initial step of a processor. But I have no strong option on it 😅
Currently, the token is spawned before. So, we would need to consume it first. I would continue with this state for now and review it later when we implemented more processors.
